entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as a character who limped inside and closed the front door, indicating he is a person.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being hit over the head with Moody's wand, indicating he is a person.

relationships.description: Moody hits Harry over the head with his wand, as described in the text: 'He rapped Harry hard over the head with his wand'.
